channel.title: 1sthoster-Unlimited Bandwith ! Ad free
channel.description:
I do not own this
Free co.cc domain(details later on this page), free .1sthoster.com subdomain or use your own domain No ads or forum posting required, no need to join a forum Easy signup Instant Activation 100MB, 1G with motivation Disk space Unmetered Bandwidth Fantastico Script Installer PHP/MySQL Safe mode off Unlimited Databases 5 Parked Domains 5 Addon Domains AWStats FTP access Sendmail enabled Hosting on clustered servers 99.5% Uptime 24h support with ticket system
Allowed: Normal hosting Adult hosting Warez linking Image hosting Not allowed: Rapidleech, Torrentflux Warez hosting File repository Email spam Phishing, hacking activity You're account will be permanently deleted if you're in violation of any of the above and you will be banned from signing up again.
Again i do not own this. [url=http://www.1sthoster.com/]http://www.1sthoster.com/[/url]

item.title: 1sthoster-Unlimited Bandwith ! Ad free
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

I doubt this is anything good. First off, the free .cc domains. They already are free, so that’s not a great addition. And, if it really is ad-free, I doubt you’ll get good service/speeds.

EXTRA: Free hosting sucks, they will give you hosting for about a week and then screw you over by making your page redirect to a bunch of advertisements.

PS: Was that enough mopar?

Read full topic
